TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IObjectReference

summary.span: 指示目前的介面實作器是對其他物件的參考。

span.span: Indicates that the current interface implementer is a reference to another object.

remarks.format: ## Examples [!code-cpp[IObjectReference Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IObjectReference Interface Example/CPP/iobjectreference.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IObjectReference Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IObjectReference Interface Example/CS/iobjectreference.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IObjectReference Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IObjectReference Interface Example/VB/iobjectreference.vb#1)]

para.span: 實作這個介面是不同的物件，直到目前的物件完全還原無法解析參考的物件。

span.span: Implement this interface on objects that are references to a different object, which cannot be resolved until the current object is completely restored.

para.span: 修復階段的任何物件實作查詢其真實物件，該物件會插入至圖形。

span.span: During the fixup stage, any object implementing is queried for its real object and that object is inserted into the graph.

para.span: 修復指的是尚未完成物件還原序列化程序期間的最終化參考程序。

span.span: Fixup refers to the process of finalizing references not already completed during the object deserialization process.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetRealObject(valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed
Public Function GetRealObject (context As StreamingContext) As Object

param.name: context
param.span: 還原序列化目前物件的來源 。

span.span: The from which the current object is deserialized.

summary.span: 傳回應該還原序列化的實際物件，而不是序列化資料流指定的物件。

span.span: Returns the real object that should be deserialized, rather than the object that the serialized stream specifies.

returns.span: 放入圖形中的實際物件。

span.span: The actual object that is put into the graph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是在遠端處理的情況下，您用來序列化 proxy 建立者物件，而不是實際的物件非常有用。This method is useful in a remoting situation where you serialize a proxy-creator object, not an actual object. 當還原序列化的建立者的 proxy 物件還原序列化呼叫其方法。When the proxy-creator object is deserialized, deserialization calls its method. 到目前為止，proxy 建立者物件建立 proxy 物件，是指回原始的實際物件，可能是在遠端電腦上的新執行個體。At this point, the proxy-creator object creates a new instance of the proxy object that refers back to the original actual object, perhaps on a remote computer. 最後，建立者的 proxy 物件會被捨棄，稍後回收進行回收。Finally, the proxy-creator object is discarded and reclaimed later by garbage collection. 例如，請考慮如何物件會序列化。For example, consider how objects are serialized. 而不是從資料傳輸物件時，系統會將傳輸的持有者物件，它位於物件，實作的組件的詳細資訊與型別物件的名稱取代。Instead of transmitting the data from the object, the system transmits a holder object with the name of the type object and information on the assembly where it is found in an object implementing . 可用的型別名稱和組件名稱時，還原序列化基礎結構會呼叫已傳輸的持有者物件。When both the type name and assembly name are available, the deserialization infrastructure calls on the holder object that has been transmitted. 此持有者傳回插入至圖形的物件。This holder returns the object that is inserted into the graph. 這個方法會受到for使用指定。This method is protected by a for the with the specified. ## Examples [!code-cpp[IObjectReference Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IObjectReference Interface Example/CPP/iobjectreference.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IObjectReference Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IObjectReference Interface Example/CS/iobjectreference.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IObjectReference Interface Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/IObjectReference Interface Example/VB/iobjectreference.vb#1)]

exception.span: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

span.span: The caller does not have the required permission.

exception.span: 呼叫無法在中度信任的伺服器上運作。

span.span: The call will not work on a medium trusted server.
